body_html:
@colesbury - looks like it completely broke symbolic export as now majority of indexing operations get traced as as_strided operation with hard-coded strides. Instead we need to capture the original indexing operations, so x[0] becomes something like Slice[start=0, end=0] instead of hard-coded dimensions of the tensor.

Any suggestions on what's a sustainable way of fixing it? At least the non-strided version of indexing needs to work.

body:
@colesbury - looks like it completely broke symbolic export as now majority of indexing operations get traced as as_strided operation with hard-coded strides. Instead we need to capture the original indexing operations, so x[0] becomes something like Slice[start=0, end=0] instead of hard-coded dimensions of the tensor.

Any suggestions on what's a sustainable way of fixing it? At least the non-strided version of indexing needs to work.
